title: Here's How Much $100 Invested In Meta Platforms 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today - Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META) - Benzinga
text:
Meta Platforms META has outperformed the market over the past 10 years by 10.01% on an annualized basis producing an average annual return of 19.64%. Currently, Meta Platforms has a market capitalization of $1.27 trillion.
Buying $100 In META: If an investor had bought $100 of META stock 10 years ago, it would be worth $604.54 today based on a price of $502.75 for META at the time of writing.
Meta Platforms's Performance Over Last 10 Years
Finally -- what's the point of all this? The key insight to take from this article is to note how much of a difference compounded returns can make in your cash growth over a period of time.
